silhouette.options.enabled.name: show silhouettes
silhouette.options.enabled.tooltip: show outlines of friendly players wherever they are in the world
silhouette.options.visual_style.name: outline style
silhouette.options.visual_style.tooltip: minecraft style is the game's default glowing effect. apex style looks kinda like apex legends. or create your own custom style!
silhouette.options.gamertags.name: show gamertags
silhouette.options.gamertags.tooltip: show player usernames clearly through walls and beyond normal range
silhouette.options.custom_style_group.to: set style to 'custom' to see these changes
silhouette.options.red.name: red
silhouette.options.green.name: green
silhouette.options.blue.name: blue
silhouette.options.luminosity.name: luminosity
silhouette.options.blur_dir.name: blur
silhouette.options.blur_dir.tooltip: turn outline blur on or off
silhouette.options.gamertag_size.name: gamertag size
silhouette.options.gamertag_size.tooltip: change text size of other player names. default/recommended is 5.
silhouette.options.insane_distance_gamer: change text size of other player names when insanely far away. default/recommended is 5.
silhouette.options.insane_distance.name: insane distance
silhouette.options.insane_distance.toolt: display player locations at insane distances when silhouettes are smaller than one pixel
silhouette.options.gamertag_style.name: gamertag style
silhouette.options.gamertag_style.toolti: colorful style will match your custom outline color
